value:
$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Ah, Prince Alfonse, there you are.
Have you thought things through?$k$pAre you here to turn yourself over
and become my prisoner?$k$pOr have you chosen to sacrifice
the lives of your citizens instead?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes, I have indeed come to provide
you with an answer.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06,0|$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...Retreat? Hm. I'm afraid that will
conclude our negotiations, Prince
Alfonse. We're at an impasse.$k$pUnfortunately, I will be forced to
continue closing your villages out
into darkness, as promised.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Your power is no longer any threat
to us. One of our number has the
ability to dispel Embla's darkness.$k$pAs head of the Curse Directive, you
must already be aware of that by
now, yes?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course I am.$k$pI've also heard that use of that power
costs your side greatly. Am I wrong?$k$pThe more darkness you dispel,
the closer your friend totters to
her death.$k$pAnd if she does nothing, more and
more of your people will serve as
sacrifice instead...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...What's your point?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|If we give in to you, it puts me at risk.
If we refuse you, others may suffer,
but no harm will come to me.$k$pThat is an easy choice. So, if we're
done here, I'll be on my way...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|You would have me believe you
do not care what happens to the
people of your kingdom?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What's difficult to understand?
Who is more important, your
underlings or you? Same thing.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Well, well, Prince Alfonse...$k$pThis is rather unexpected given the
intelligence I have on you.$k$pBut could it be...you have a
more violent side to you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Intelligence also brings me some...
incongruous information as well.$k$pConcerning the death of King Gustav,
for example.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Then you must know that I killed him.$k$pHe got in my way.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|As you no doubt know, my father
abandoned me in our struggle.$k$pI could not inherit the crown and
take the throne as things stood...$k$pBut if my father were to disappear,
I was next in line.$k$pSo, I killed him.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|What an interesting story.$k$pI'm sure someday I'll be able to
use that information to shake the
foundations of Askr itself, but...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|You don't seem to be hearing me.
Why do you think I'm talking about
this? Why to you? Why now?$k$pI'll tell you.$k$pI'm going to kill you too.$k$pYou're in my way, so this is how
it will have to be. No matter what
it takes, my decision's been made.$k$pNo hostage will save you. You cannot
stop what's coming for you. Do you
understand now?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|...I see.$k$pIt seems I misjudged you.$k$p$EFace_Smile|The gentle prince who captured
the hearts of his people... Hah.
I should have known it was all lies.$k$pShrouding yourself in a veil of false
affection as a means of controlling
the foolish masses?$k$pKilling your own father to get
the crown?$k$pMark my words: these truths will
come to light.$k$p...Perhaps you and I share more
in common than our respective
Orders after all.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|I was wrong to underestimate you.
You may keep your head on your
shoulders for now.$k$pOnce I've had the satisfaction of
separating Veronica's from hers,
THEN I will come for your head.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|*sigh* I hope this isn't all
for nothing...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Alfonse, have you lost your mind?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sh-Sharena! What did—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cry|How could you say such terrible,
heartless things?! How COULD you?$k$pI miss my gentle brother! Bring him
back to me! Brotherrr!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Calm down for a minute, Sharena!
It was all an act! ...Ow!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|...There never is a dull moment with
you two, is there?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Zacharias?! When— Where did
you come from?!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Veronica is set to be executed
10 days from now.$k$pI am sorry to have to ask like this,
but I need your strength once more.
Will you help me?$k$p$Sbs150|
